bibl.title: S›tow / purÒw in Egypt as Deliberate Mixtures of Wheat with Barley. Avec résumé en anglais. <sitos, puros>
bibl.note: The terms s›tow and purÒw, in the Roman and early Arab period, refer to unrefined mixed wheat and barley, not to pure wheat (kayarÒw). <sitos, puros, katharos>
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, S›tow / purÒw in Egypt as Deliberate Mixtures of Wheat with Barley. Avec résumé en anglais. <sitos, puros>
